resources.string: Hey, checkout PinYourBin, An app to help clean our streets. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.pinyourbin.pinyourbin

PinYourBin v1.0
License: GNU GPL v3


PinYourBin is a social app to place virtual dustbins. 

Decide where should a bin be placed by pining a dustbin. 

More pins in a geographic area mean higher chances of its installation. 

Let's make our planet clean!


Dhiraj Thakur, Anshul Singh and contributors. 
Se7en Inc.

You turn on your location services and place a bin where you feel there should be dustbin. 

The pinned data from all users is collected at out servers where it is aggregated and stored. 

As more bins are placed the app will recommend places to set up dustbins which will ultimately prevent litter. 

Hope you see a lot of bins!
